attributes.action: Reintroduce Conscription for all persons over the age of 18 years who are unemployed for twelve months after leaving School.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the lack of teacher & parent discipline due to E.U and Human Rights Regulations it would be appropriate for young people who cannot find employment and/or choose to 'rome' the streets in groups, to be disciplined in a Service that a) Is beneficial to them, b) is beneficial to the Country. This should be carried out in a way similar to post war conscription.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
